ygData.messageBody:
> I am a level 7 monk and i have 20 points to spend. Would you recommend i spend them on offensive skills now, save them for later, use them on a skill to make money, or use them on throwing. If on
> throwing is it a really good skill to get, does it do any damage or is it just to attract animals as ive heard. Thanks for your time.

> -Krazer, Level 7 Monk, Tunare

No matter what, dont use them on offensive skills. Your skills will
max out at each level as you use them. Waste of points. I've found
Throwing to be a useless skill as well, only using it rarely to lure.

If I were you, I'd save them for Feign Death at level 17.

Anyone but me that feels skill points are pretty useless for monks?
Hehe, I mean, after you get feign death, how many skills are left? 4?
5? And most, if not all, monk skills are used in combat constantly, so
they'll max out by themselfs.

*shrug* Might just be me...

--Jake
Aka Laintal Novacek, level 24 monk, Povar.
